About the Channel

Espen Helland is a Norwegian wildlife photographer based in Perthshire, Scotland, with a background in wildlife biology and conservation. After working as an ecologist, he developed a passion for telling the stories of the natural world through photography. Since switching to Olympus (OM System) in 2020, he‚Äôs become known for his detailed technical knowledge and his popular OM System for Wildlife Photography course, which has sold over 500 courses.

Content Style

  • Wildlife-focused with emphasis on birds and mammals
  • Technical deep dives into camera settings and optimization
  • Conservation storytelling combining science and art
  • Field tutorials showing real-world shooting scenarios
  • Pro Capture mastery and advanced camera features

Why We Recommend This Channel

Espen‚Äôs combination of wildlife biology expertise and photographic skill makes his content uniquely valuable. He doesn‚Äôt just show you what settings to use - he explains the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind each choice, helping you understand your camera at a deeper level. His course work and YouTube videos have helped thousands of photographers get more from their OM System cameras.

Best For

  • Wildlife and bird photographers
  • OM System camera users (E-M1 series, OM-1)
  • Those wanting to master Pro Capture
  • Understanding advanced autofocus systems
  • Learning camera optimization for nature work

Key Specialties

  • Pro Capture techniques for split-second behaviors
  • High Res mode for maximum detail with low noise
  • Custom button/dial setups for field efficiency
  • Birds in flight autofocus strategies
  • Conservation photography storytelling
